text: Gowani na ipkholob Iyan rkano so toratod, a sarig a phoon Rkaniyan, go pthoronan kano Niyan a phoon ko kawang sa ig, ka an on misabap a kasotiya Niyan rkano, go an Iyan rkano maylang so pangangalk o shaytan, go an Iyan matkhs so manga poso iyo, go an on misabap a kapakabkna Niyan ko manga parapara
